tool_description: Generates demand forecasts using historical sales data and seasonality patterns to predict future inventory requirements.

product_sku.description: Product SKU to forecast demand for

historical_start_date.description: Start date for historical data analysis

historical_end_date.description: End date for historical data analysis

forecast_horizon_days.description: Number of days to forecast ahead (1-365)

seasonality_factor.description: Whether to include seasonal adjustments in forecast

trend_analysis.description: Whether to include trend analysis in forecast

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: Need at least 30 days of sales history for reliable forecasting.
Invalid date range: historical_start_date must be before historical_end_date, and both must be in the past.
Invalid forecast horizon: forecast_horizon_days must be between 1 and 365.
Invalid confidence level: confidence_level must be between 0.8 and 0.99.
Product not found: The specified SKU has no sales history in the system.
usage: Provide product_sku, historical date range, and forecast_horizon_days. Optionally enable seasonality_factor and trend_analysis for more sophisticated forecasting.

forecast_periods.description: Array of dates for the forecast period

confidence_intervals.description: Confidence intervals in format 'lower,upper' for each forecast day

forecast_accuracy_score.description: Model accuracy score based on historical validation
